title: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss by Ibn Sirin. See the most accurate interpretations

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about hair loss in a dream in detail from leading scholars and dream interpreters. Seeing hair in a dream means money and longevity, but what does it mean to see hair falling out in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about hair loss by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says in interpreting a dream about hair loss that Whoever sees in his dream that his hair fell from his head and held it in his hand, then this dream indicates his fulfillment of his promises. Whoever sees in a dream that his hair is falling out and his hair is falling out, this dream indicates that the dreamer will receive compensation for something he lost. Whoever sees in a dream that his hair is falling out And his hair is falling out profusely, so this dream indicates joy and happiness. Whoever sees in a dream that his hair is falling out and does not know the reason for his hair loss, then this dream indicates worries and sorrows. See also: Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream for a man and a woman. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss: Interpretation of a dream indicates hair loss. Also to kindness, nourishment, and a lot of money. Whoever dreams that his hair is falling out and is braiding it, then this dream indicates that he will save and save money. Whoever sees in a dream that his hair is falling out a lot and the color of the falling hair is black, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will attain wealth and abundance. It is He saw in his dream that his hair had fallen out and new hair had grown in its place. This indicates anxiety and distress. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for unmarried women: Hair loss in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that anxiety and sadness will disappear. Also, a dream about hair loss in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates Her success and excellence in her studies or life affairs. If she sees that her hair is falling out while she is in a period of courtship, this dream indicates her closeness. Seeing hair loss in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her recovery from illness and the end of the period of sadness and tension that she is experiencing. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that her hair is falling out and is black, then this dream indicates her husband’s love for her. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams of her hair falling out, then this dream indicates that her due date is approaching. If a pregnant woman dreams that her hair is falling out If the hair falling out is white, then this dream indicates that she will give birth to a boy. And if she sees that her hair is falling out and the color of the falling hair is blond, then this dream indicates that she will give birth to a girl. Interpretation of a dream about beard hair falling out in a dream: And whoever dreams of his beard hair falling out, this dream indicates the repayment of the debt and the disappearance of sorrows and adversities. Interpretation of a dream of hair loss from the eyebrows: Whoever dreams of hair loss from the eyebrow, this dream indicates anxiety and illness. The dream of hair loss from the eyebrows also indicates a major loss and the loss of a loved one. See also: Eating fish in a dream by leading scholars and commentators. Watch also the video Seeing hair loss In a dream, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about hair loss in a dream and what the appearance of hair loss indicates for single, married, and pregnant women. You can comment and ask about your dreams by writing your dream in a comment, taking into account your family situation, and we will respond to you immediately. Greetings from the Family in Dreams website, the dream interpretation website honest.

title: Interpretation of a dream about preparing for a wedding in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to prepare for the wedding in a dream: Preparing for the wedding is one of the desires and actions undertaken by every young man and girl, as the wedding and its other details require a lot of preparations to make the wedding successful and secret, but what? It happens if these details appear in anyone’s dream, then the dream certainly carries in its meaning many different connotations and interpretations. In this article, we will consider the interpretation of the dream of preparing for a wedding in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the dream of preparing for a wedding in a dream for a married womanDreams enter a dream for a married woman Among them is a dream about preparing for a wedding, where the woman at that time is confused, and as a result she is looking for a satisfactory interpretation of her vision, and we will present that here. The interpretation is as follows: If the dreaming woman has children of marriageable age, then there is no doubt that preparation for marriage in a dream. It shows the approaching marriage of children in the near future. Most dream interpreters see that preparing for a wedding for a woman in a dream. It symbolizes true and real preparation For this woman to change her life for the better and better. As well as get rid of the mistakes and negatives in it. Whereas if this woman is suffering from some disorders and health problems at the present time. There is no doubt that this dream portends an imminent death and the end of these health problems. As for Imam Al-Sadiq, he believes that Preparing for a married woman’s wedding in a dream. It may symbolize that this woman does not feel comfortable, calm and stable with her current husband. If a woman sees that she is preparing for her husband’s wedding in a dream. This indicates that she will live a stable and quiet life with her husband in the coming days. In the event that she faces The dreamer has a set of problems with her husband in reality. Preparing for a wedding in a dream again indicates imminent death and the end of these disputes. Whereas if a woman sees that she is marrying another man who is not her real husband, this indicates that she will leave her job in the next stage and move to a new job. Whereas if this woman is a widow, then preparing for marriage in a dream symbolizes the high status of her husband. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for marriage. See also: Interpretation of a dream that you ran away from your wedding in a dream and its effects. A dream about preparing for a wedding. During this chapter, we will present the interpretation of a dream about preparing for marriage for an unmarried girl, according to what The dream interpreters reported this dream in detail: Dream interpreters say that the preparation for a wedding in the dream is for an unmarried girl, because it was not accompanied by drumming, singing, and dancing. It undoubtedly symbolizes the good news and events that await this girl. Whereas if the preparation was accompanied With singing, drums, and dancing. This may symbolize that this girl will be exposed to some misfortunes, misfortunes, worries, disasters, and crises in the next stage. Ibn Sirin confirms that preparing an unmarried person for marriage indicates that this girl will find a job or a new job in the coming period. If this girl is in University, this indicates that the girl is about to graduate from university. Free sees

title: The most important interpretations of bananas in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: Bananas in a dream: It is a vision that has multiple interpretations and I have many questions about it, especially since bananas are a fruit rich in vitamins and minerals. If this is true in real life, what about its correct interpretation in a dream? ! Will this vision be something pleasant or shameful, we learn this in detail in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream Seeing bananas in a dream is one of the dreams in which the dreamer abounds in goodness, food, and blessings. If the dreamer is in the stages of academic education and sees bananas in large quantities in a dream, then it is The good news is that the dreamer will obtain the highest academic grades and enjoy a prominent social status. Banana trees in a dream are considered one of the promising visions that indicate the dreamer’s standing with his Lord, and this vision shows the dreamer’s strong commitment to his daily duties and his supplication to God Almighty. A rotten banana in a dream symbolizes that The dreamer will fall into a difficult health crisis and suffer from a serious illness that may cause his death. Interpretation of a dream about bananas by Ibn Sirin. According to what was narrated by Ibn Sirin, seeing bananas in a dream is one of the good dreams that warns the dreamer of acquiring abundant money and being able to achieve whatever he wants. If the dreamer sees that He eats a ripe yellow banana with a delicious taste, it is good that all the dreamer’s living conditions will improve, as he will be able to get rid of some family problems that have disturbed his life in the previous period. However, if the dreamer sees that he is picking bananas from trees, this is an indication of his hasty opinion in making his future decisions, and because of this haste, he will be exposed to many problems. Distributing bananas to friends and family is a sign that the dreamer is about to hear long-awaited good news. Bananas in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiqiri Imam Al-Sadiq said that seeing a dreamer buying large quantities of bananas in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s efforts to achieve his dreams, and thanks to this effort he will rise to a high social position. He ate green, unripe bananas in a dream, and the dreamer suffered from its bitterness, as it is one of the shameful visions that warns the dreamer of Facing some obstacles in life. Selling bananas in a dream is one of the pleasant dreams that indicate that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money due to starting a new project or starting a profitable business. Seeing bananas in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing yellow bananas and eating them in a dream for an unmarried woman is A promising vision and carries good news for her about the date of her engagement to a financially wealthy person with whom she will spend her life full of happiness. If an unmarried woman sees that her room has a large amount of bananas, this is a sign that the dreamer will find a new job that will bring her a lot of money. If an unmarried woman sees A married woman herself shares bananas with someone unknown to her, so this is a sign that she will soon marry someone who associates her with affection and compassion. Interpretation of a dream about eating bananas or buying them in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman ate bananas in a dream, and it tasted good, a sign that all of the dreamer’s circumstances will improve He will be freed from many pains

title: Interpretation of the letter S in a dream according to Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about soap by Imam Al-SadiqSoap is one of the praiseworthy symbols that heralds a near recovery in a patient’s dream, especially when he sees the patient washing his clothes with soap and water, or washing his clothes with it.The boy in a dream of Imam Al-SadiqThe boy is a sign of weakness and anxiety and the accumulation of worries in the dreamer, and it may indicate exposure to major problems from While seeing it in a man or woman’s dream, especially when his clothes are loose and his appearance is ugly. The letter S in Nabulsi’s dream. Dreams of the letter S. Newspapers in the dream of Imam al-Sadiq. Newspapers or newspapers. Their vision may indicate the dreamer’s work in this world and its circumstances. Whenever the writing is coordinated in these newspapers, this is a reflection of the life of the fortuneteller. Happy without worries and problems, and vice versa. A dream about Imam al-Sadiq’s rock. The rock is one of the symbols that indicates a woman capable of taking responsibility and relying on herself, and the rock in general is one of the symbols that means long life for the dreamer or alerts the dreamer to a lot of forgetfulness, and God knows best. A headache in a dream for the Imam The sincere dream of a dreamer who suffers from a headache is one of the symbols that mean many sins and transgressions, and so this vision is one of the messages that the dreamer sends to warn him, and that he must re-examine himself well and preserve it. On the rope of God Almighty. A dream about a falcon by Imam Al-Sadiq. A falcon is one of the symbols that indicates strength, rigor, and the ability to overcome difficulties and challenges. A falcon in a dream of a married woman or a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a male child with whom she will have a relationship in the future if she wants - God. A prayer in a dream for the Imam. Al-Sadiq: Supplication in a dream is one of the signs that symbolize the dreamer’s conditions in the coming days, a sign of overcoming worries and problems, overcoming difficulties, and a sign of repentance from sin and disobedience, and God knows best. Baldness in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Baldness is one of the symbols that it is not desirable to see and that portends many problems, worries, or debts that he cannot The viewer carries it, and it is also a sign of exposure to temptation, betrayal, or loss of prestige, influence, or power, God forbid. Dreaming of the cross of Imam al-SadiqThe cross in a dream can foretell the dreamer of a difficult period that he will go through, and it can mean the spread of temptations and heresies around the dreamer, and the dreamer also He follows his desires and tells lies, slander, and falsehoods, and God knows best. The jeweler in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. The jeweler in a dream is a person who works in the field of manufacturing, buying and selling gold jewellery, and his vision is considered undesirable symbols that indicate immorality, exposure to deception, severe injustice, fraud and knowledge with God. The dyer in a dream Imam Al-Sadiq Al-Sabbagh is a worker in the field of dye manufacturing. Seeing him in a dream also indicates unpleasant things, because it warns the dreamer of injustice due to false words and slander. Only God knows. A dream about the morning of Imam al-Sadiq. In the morning, his appearance and seeing him in the dreamer’s dream are praiseworthy symbols that portend the death of worries and problems, the fulfillment of promises, the victory of truth and the death of falsehood and injustice. Meanings of the letter Sad for Imam al-Sadiq. Hearing his voice in a dream is

title: Interpretation of a dream library in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of a chest in Ibn Sirin’s dreamInterpretation of dreamsWardrobe in a dream refers to nostalgia for the days of childhood and the past. If one sees in his dream that he is losing his wardrobe, this indicates that he lacks security and a sense of comfort. Seeing a dream of a wardrobe with drawers full of pictures and memories, this indicates that The dreamer is a person who feels a narrow life. Seeing a library in a dream is a sign of responsibility and importance. Interpretation of seeing a closet in a dream for a single woman: One girl’s vision shows a closet, which is filled with a lot of clothes and arranged, and this indicates good events. Seeing a girl arranging clothes in the closet, this is a sign of her desire In recalculating. Interpretation of a dream about a safe in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman dreaming of a money box is evidence of the security that the woman feels. However, seeing treasure stolen in a dream indicates the presence of envy in this dreamer’s life. As for seeing a dream about a closed money safe, this is an indication of The security and stable life in which this woman lives. Seeing a closet in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is storing clothes in the closet, this indicates the ambition that she wants to achieve and also shows her desire to satisfy the desire of her desired gender, whether male or female. Seeing a closet made of Gold is a sign of the happiness that can be found after childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about a wardrobe in a dream for a man: Look at the man inside the dream: The wardrobe is filled with only bread, which indicates the difficulty of life that the dreamer lives. As for seeing a wardrobe full of fruits, it indicates the prosperity of life. Seeing yourself storing Large quantities of food are evidence of an extensive diet. Seeing an empty cupboard in a dream is a sign of a financial crisis. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness

preview.html: They are sad because they will leave their loved ones, but what you do not know is that such a dream does not have a bad meaning in itself, as we will show you in this article. Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Kathir interpreted that seeing the dreamer in a dream is a serious illness. However, this The person is in good health and his body is free of diseases, God willing. We can conclude from this interpretation that the interpretation of the dream conflicts with the ugliness of his vision. Ibn Sirin also interpreted the dreamer’s vision of a serious illness in the dream, indicating that the dreamer is a person who doubts his nature in everything around him. And to be surrounded by a group of hypocrites who praise him out of greed for his money or to harm him, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is seriously ill and then dies, then this dream indicates that he will get rid of his problems and worries, God willing. Seeing the dreamer suffering from a serious illness in His dream is a sign that he will fall into disastrous attacks that will make his condition deteriorate to the worst, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is suffering from a serious illness, and that he has suffered from it for a long time, then this dream foretells to him that God will improve his ending, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a vision Illness in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees that she is suffering from a chronic or fatal disease, then the dream here tells her that her body will not come close to the disease, God willing. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is seriously ill, but she does not feel pain. This means He will achieve what he wants with God’s help and grace. Also, this dream may indicate a deteriorating psychological state. During this time you will not be able to make deterrent decisions, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing adultery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing adultery in a dream, and seeing adultery in a dream, indicates abundant profit in a merchant’s dream, theft, and seeing an unknown woman committing infidelity can indicate lawsuits, trial, and imprisonment, as is the case with adultery in a dream. An illicit sexual relationship between two people and in many religions prostitution is considered a taboo and corrupt relationship. Prostitution in a dream is considered an experience, troubles, and difficulties in life, exposing the person to many problems and disagreements. Follow us. Dream of seeing adultery by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a dreamer committing adultery is an honest matter when the dreamer comes to court for a non-fanatic person. Seeing adultery in a dream means betrayal. While seeing adultery in a dream shows purity and chastity. Seeing a dreamer committing adultery with a woman he knows means that he covets the person’s money. Seeing an unknown adulteress is a good thing. And saying adultery is theft in reality. Dreaming of seeing adultery with a woman other than his wife. If the dreamer sees a woman other than his wife, such as the wife of a relative or friend, then he gets money through that woman. Seeing a merchant in this dream means that Fidel is making a big profit. Dreaming of seeing adultery ManSeeing a dreamer with another man means that he will get closer to love, affection and fame. Seeing a dreamer having sex with a man does not know the good news that joy and happiness will reach him. Seeing a dreamer Fidel realizes that something will be shared with him. If he sees that the dreamer has someone he knows, it will help him to Defeating his opponents. Dreaming of seeing adultery with incest. Seeing a father committing adultery with his daughter indicates the presence of problems between him and his daughter. Seeing the dreamer having sex with a mahram woman indicates the severing of affection and relationship between family members and the severing of ties. Seeing the dreamer having sex with a mahram woman indicates the occurrence of... Disasters. Seeing a dreamer having sex with his mother indicates his death and may indicate disobeying her and breaking off relations. Seeing a dreamer with an unmarried girl indicates a young man’s marriage to a beautiful girl. Seeing a dreamer having sexual intercourse with a maid indicates good luck and happy days. A dream about adultery also indicates for an unmarried person To his deep-rooted desires. Seeing a married woman committing adultery indicates the extent to which she retains her love and affection for her husband. Dreaming of seeing adultery from an unknown woman. Prostitution is taboo, and in a dream it can cause psychological exhaustion and fear from this vision, and it can be a sign of good or bad. Seeing adultery in a divorced woman’s dream may indicate her return to her ex-husband, and for a righteous and pious man, it may indicate a prestigious job and success in his work. If a man sees that he is committing adultery with an unknown woman, this may indicate problems and troubles that he faces. This vision also indicates that he is committing adultery with an unknown woman. It indicates that the dreamer will experience trials and tribulations, in addition to many problems and disagreements. Or it indicates symptoms of obedience to God and many sins. If a man dreams that he is committing adultery with an unknown woman, this may indicate trouble and suffering. It also indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to adversity, pain, and many problems. And disagreements. Whoever sees in a dream that he is committing adultery with an unknown woman, it may indicate...

title: Interpretation of a dream about entering Paradise in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about entering the Garden of Paradise in a dream. In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about entering the Garden of Paradise in a dream, there are a large number of connotations and interpretations of dreams, and we find that in general, scholars and workers seek interpretations, and site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, rather they send the scholars’ interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about entering Paradise in a dream: Seeing yourself entering Paradise in a dream may indicate the happiness that the dreamer feels during this time. In the case of dreaming about entering Paradise in a dream, it can indicate getting rid of sins and sins and getting closer to God Almighty. It is possible that Dreaming of entering Paradise is an indication of the happy events that the dreamer may encounter during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of entering a house to memorize the Qur’an in a dream Entering a house to memorize the Qur’an in a dream may indicate the wisdom and knowledge that the dreamer enjoyed at that time. And if one sees That it entered the preservation houses is due to Saladin and the circumstances of those days. It is possible that seeing her entering the memorial house in a dream may indicate important changes occurring in her life during this period. Dreaming of entering a memorial house in a dream may indicate material gains that a person will acquire during this vision. During this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about inserting a pin into the leg in a dream: Inserting a pin into the foot may indicate the presence of financial obstacles that the dreamer may face at that time. In the event that someone sees that a pin has been inserted into his foot, this may indicate Some problems and difficulties in his life during those days. In the event that a person sees that a pin has been inserted into his foot, this may indicate some family problems that the person having the vision is facing. It is possible that seeing pins in the foot is a sign of distress that the person having the vision may be suffering from. At that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about worms entering the ear in a dream: In the event that you see worms entering the ear in a dream, it may indicate some rumors that the dreamer is suffering from at that time. Worms entering the ear in a dream may indicate that he heard some disturbing news. On those days, seeing worms entering a person’s ear may indicate that the person with insight is interested in people’s words and opinions. Seeing worms entering the ear in a dream may indicate unpleasant events that the dreamer may suffer from during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about entering a military course in a dream may Seeing yourself entering a military course indicates good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during those days. In the event that a person sees himself entering a military course in a dream, this may indicate happy events for the dreamer during these days. Seeing yourself entering a military course in a dream could be a sign It may indicate that you hear happy news during this time, thanks to God. To see yourself entering the military march in a dream may indicate happy events that the dreamer may encounter during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my neighbor entering my house in a dream: If someone sees his neighbor entering his house This may indicate the joy that comes to me

title: Seeing another person vomiting in a dream

preview.html: Seeing another person vomiting in a single woman’s dream When an unmarried woman sees in a dream that another person is religious, this dream portends many situations and interpretations, including: In addition to seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, there is a girl vomiting next to her in the dream. This indicates The dream indicates that this girl hates her. This dream also indicates that the girl who sees this dream will receive many good things in her life and that her future will be bright. And seeing a girl in a dream where someone vomits next to her and she was in a state of sadness. This dream indicates that there is a big problem. It will happen in her life and it may be related to her love life or work-related. Also, when you see an unmarried woman vomiting yellow vomit, she will suffer greatly in this matter. This is evidence that he was on the path of sin, but we have repented for what he did. And seeing an unmarried woman in The dream is that her sister is vomiting next to her. This dream indicates that this sister is committing many sins but she repents for them. Moreover, an unmarried woman dreams in her dream of emptying her stomach and she is sick after that. This dream is a sign that she will lose a lot of money that she has collected from Her work. See also: What is the interpretation of seeing someone vomiting in a dream? Seeing another person vomiting in a married woman’s dream Sometimes a married woman sees a dream that she is vomiting or another person is vomiting and it has different connotations: Seeing a married woman in a dream is a dream that sees another woman vomiting next to her This dream indicates that she will get rid of many problems related to her friends and put an end to them. A woman sees that she is vomiting and the color of the vomit is black and has a foul smell. This dream indicates that she committed many sins and transgressions, but he repented of them and returned to the path of righteousness. Also, a married woman sees in Her dream is that her husband is vomiting and emptying his stomach of something unpleasant. This indicates that she and her family will live a long time and that her husband will obtain an excellent position in his work. While a married woman may see in a dream that she is vomiting in the form of jewelry or pearls. This dream indicates that she is one of the righteous and distinguished women. Obedience and closeness to her Lord in worship. A married woman may see that one of her children is vomiting and becomes seriously ill. This dream indicates that she will soon lose the one she loves dearly. Likewise, seeing a married woman vomiting and who was suffering from major financial problems. This dream indicates that she will get a lot of The good things in her life and that she will get a lot of money. Seeing another person vomiting in a pregnant dream A dream of vomiting in a dream can come to a pregnant woman and has many different interpretations and implications, which are as follows: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is a dream that she is vomiting and the color of the vomit is dark. This dream indicates that this woman will suffer from severe pain during pregnancy and childbirth. Especially seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is someone vomiting next to her and being upset by this sight. This dream shows the many problems he suffers from as he mixes with the surrounding society. You may also see a pregnant woman in a dream She vomits

title: Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of sleeping in bed

preview.html: Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of sleeping in a bed: In fact, a divorced woman dreams of sleeping on a bed made of soft cotton. Great evidence that she will marry a rich man again. But if a divorced woman dreams that she is sleeping on a bed made of brocade, then this dream indicates that she will marry the Magi, And God Almighty knows best. After all, the dream of a divorced woman is to sleep in a beautiful white bed. And soon she will marry a man who fears God in all his actions. He must take complete care of this man because he is committed to God in all his actions. We also find that there are many interpreters Those who see the dream of a divorced woman sleeping in bed next to her ex-husband. This dream is evidence that she will return to her husband and that God is higher. Also, the dream of a divorced woman in her dream of repairing her bed and working to arrange it has a great indication of establishing her relationship with God. In addition to that, it shows This dream is that this woman loves doing good to others all the time and always tries to perform her prayers on time. This dream indicates that the woman worships God Almighty with good worship. Moreover, the divorced woman makes her bed in a dream. Clear evidence of her great ability to The fulfillment of her dream in the near future. We also find that the dream of a divorced woman buying a beautiful new bed is due to her great ability to solve all crises and problems. And do not forget to read our article about: Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed with someone I know. Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream for a divorced woman by Ibn Sirin. In fact, it interprets Ibn Sirin dreams of a divorced woman sleeping in a bed covered with mattresses. This is evidence that she stands tall above many of the hypocrites surrounding her. But if the divorced woman dreams of sleeping on a bed covered with mattresses and wearing sandals, this is clear evidence that she is traveling with hypocrites. Ibn Sirin also believes that The dream of a divorced woman is that she is sleeping on a bed and she does not know it. This indicates that this woman will meet the king, and God knows best. Moreover, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of a bed indicates that something returns to her after she lost it. Seeing a bed in a dream of the Imam’s wife Divorced Nabulsi: We find that Imam Nabulsi dreams of a divorced woman on a bed not covered with a mattress. Evidence that he will travel soon. In addition, the dream of a divorced woman is to sleep without a mattress. This vision is a clear indication that his strength will weaken, but it will soon return strong again. As Al-Nabulsi believes that a divorced woman’s dream of a beautiful bed is a clear symbol of her reaching a high position by God’s command. If a divorced woman becomes ill and dreams that she is sleeping on a bed, this dream is evidence of her death, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. But if a sick divorced woman dreams of a bed in front of her, then she will recover soon. Interpretation of seeing the bed In a dream for a divorced woman, according to Ibn Shaheen: If a divorced woman dreams that her bed is broken, then the dream indicates that the king, her authority, and her strength will depart from life, and God is higher. Also, this dream may have a clear indication that he will be exposed to death in the near future, and that God is higher. Do not hesitate to Visit our article about: Interpretation of dreams for sleeping with pain
